greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of n-node unlabeled rooted trees with every leaf at height k; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<=n-1, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
example: The A048816(5) = 5 rooted trees with 5 nodes with every leaf at the same height sorted by height are:
: o o o o : o   o   o   :   o   :  o  :
:         : o   o o o o :   o   :  o  :
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := T[n, k] = If[n == 1, 1, If[k == 0, 0, Sum[ Sum[ If[d<k, 0, T[d, k-1]*d], {d, Divisors[j]}] * T[n-j, k], {j, 1, n-1}]/(n-1)]]; Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n-1}], {n, 1, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 28 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 08 2014
